Legal_Issue: Failure to consider request for discretion under section 11(3)
Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations, section 11(3)
Application_Facts: Yan scored 61 units, below the required 70; requested discretionary consideration based on qualifications
Court_Ruling: Court allowed judicial review, found breach of procedural fairness
Defendant_Behavior: Visa officer ignored request for discretion
Legal_Standard: Duty of procedural fairness in administrative decision-making
Procedural_Issue: Failure to consider a specific request for discretion
Evidence_Assessed: Yan's qualifications and request for discretion
Governing_Rule: Visa officers must consider requests for discretion under section 11(3)
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Failure to address submitted request for discretion
Outcome: Decision quashed, matter referred back for redetermination
Harm_Assessment: Unfair denial of opportunity for discretionary assessment
Cause_Description: Application rejected without considering request for discretionary approval
Legal_Provision_Violated: Section 11(3) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Evidence_Issues: Ignored relevant request and supporting qualifications
Evidence_Assessment: Qualifications and discretion request not evaluated
Decision_Rationale: Breach of procedural fairness due to non-consideration of discretion request
Decision_Making_Body: Federal Court of Canada, Trial Division
Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to consider submitted evidence and request
